forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
